thread.section_title: Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wedding Night Suite
thread.title_full: Wedding Night Suite - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: GreatNorthFood
title: Wedding Night Suite
text:
We had a great destination wedding in San Fran, and Stayed here after the wedding. We were staying in one of the suites and had a great room! We did go down to the bar, but decided to go to the Suite and just order a BUNCH of sweets and drinks. We could have had more then enough room for about 10 of us to be in the suit to stay the night, but were so happy to have a night with no baby and a happy bride and groom! Would stay there again
Room Tip: we just let them pick the suite, but it was by far the biggest room we have ever stayed in. See more room tips Green Features: they have the usual of expectations for a Hyatt. water service, clothes and linen washing only when needed, etc
